original: Āsavañceva āsavasampayuttañca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavo ceva naāsavavippayutto ca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: āsavañca iva āsava sampayuttañca hetum dhammam paṭicca na āsavaḥ ca iva na āsava vippayuttaḥ ca na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Āsavasampayuttañceva no ca āsavaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavo ceva naāsavavippayutto
analyzed: āsava sampayuttam ca iva no ca āsavam hetum dhammam paṭicca na āsavaḥ ca iva na āsava vippayutto

original: ca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cattāri …pe… avigate cattāri.
analyzed: ca na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā eka saṅkhitta hetuyā cattāri pe avigate cattāri

original: Āsavañceva āsavasampayuttañca nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavavippayutto ceva nano ca āsavo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
analyzed: āsavam ca iva āsava sampayuttañca na hetum dhammam paṭicca na āsava vippayuttaḥ ca iva na no ca āsavaḥ na na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā eka

original: Āsavasampayuttañceva no ca āsavaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavavippayutto ceva
analyzed: āsava sampayuttam ca iva no ca āsavam na hetum dhammam paṭicca na āsava vippayuttaḥ ca iva

original: nano ca āsavo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā
analyzed: na no ca āsavaḥ na na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi saṅkhitta hetuyā
